title: The Otherworld, Goddess, and Anchor - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   God Protagonist   Goddesses   Neet
author: Anmin   アンミン
description: Fiona, the goddess who was for the first time working as a God, decided to go to Earth due to having too much free time to enjoy a fulfilling gaming life as a NEET. However, the number of her believers suddenly dropped and her qualification as a God is in danger of being revoked. Thus, she hurried back to Heaven's City Hall but...>
